paper_title.en: Role of interleukin-8 secreted from human oral squamous cell carcinoma cell lines

paper_title.ja: 腎移植患者に生じたアフタ性口内炎の1例
口腔扁平上皮癌細胞のFas誘導アポトーシスに対する抗癌剤の効果
paper_title.en: EFFECTS OF ANTICANCER DRUG ON FAS-MEDIATED APOPTOSIS IN CANCER CELLS

description.ja: Fas 抗原は, アポトーシス誘導因子として重要である。Fas 依存性アポトーシスは, 免疫機構における腫瘍細胞の排除に関与している。本研究は, 抗癌剤処理の口腔扁平上皮癌細胞 (NA, HSC-4) の Fas 抗原の変化を検討することである。CDDPあるいは5-FU処理癌細胞の Fas 抗原の検出は, フローサイトメーターで解析した。mRNAの検出は, RT-PCR法で行った。アポトーシス活性は, 抗 Fas 抗体, CH-11添加時のフローサイトメーターによる annexin-V 陽性細胞率とカスパーゼ活性によって測定した。臨床的に用いられている濃度のCDDPと5-FUは, 癌細胞の Fas 抗原の増強を示した。さらに, 抗 Fas 抗体誘導アポトーシス感受性およびカスパーゼ-3と-8の活性化も充進した。抗癌剤は従来の細胞傷害性とは異なる Fas 依存性アポトーシス感受性の増強効果を発揮し, 新たな抗腫瘍機序の展開を示唆している。
description.en: The transmembrane receptor Fas is a key regulator of apoptosis. Fas-mediated apoptosis plays a role in eliminating some tumor cells, through the immune system. This study was conducted to investigate the modulation of Fas gene and protein expression by treatment of squamous cell carcinoma cells with anticancer drugs. Fas Ag expression on HSC-4 and NA, which are oral cancer cell lines, treated with an anticancer drug: cisplatin (CDDP) or 5-fluorouracil (5-FU), and was analyzed using flow cytometry. Fas messenger RNA (mRNA) levels were studied using a reverse transcription-polymerase chain reaction assay. The apoptotic activities of agonistic anti-Fas antibody: CH-11, against cancer cells were assessed by annexin-V assay and measurement of caspase activity. The binding of annexin-V was also measured by flow cytometry. The caspase activity in cell cytosol was measured using the Caspase Colorimetric Protease Assay Kit. Clinically relevant concentrations of anticancer drugs tested enhanced Fas and its mRNA expression on plasma membrane of cancer cells. The enhancement of Fas expression was associated with an increased susceptibility of cancer cells to agonistic anti-Fas antibodies (p<0.01). Caspase-3 and -8 activities were also detected in the apoptotic cancer cells. Chemotherapeutic drugs enhanced the susceptibility of cancer cells to Fas-mediated apoptosis, in addition to their direct cytotoxicity. From these findings, new potential strategies may be developed to improve the efficacy of chemotherapeutic drugs.

paper_title.ja: 我々が行っている顎変形症患者の治療システム(共著)
下顎非対称症例に片側下顎枝垂直骨切り術を用いた1例(共著)
paper_title.en: Unilateral Intraoral Vertical Ramus Osteotomy for a Patient with Mandibular Asymmetry

description.ja: A case of mandibular asymmetry of a 19-year-old male is reported. The unilateral sagittal ramus osteotomy combined with contralateral intraoral vertical ramus osteotomy was performed on this case. Although the occlusion and the jaw movement were seemingly improved at the end of active orthogna-thic treatment, new symptoms of temporomandibular joint were observed during the retention period, which required further follow-up.
description.en: A case of mandibular asymmetry of a 19-year-old male is reported. The unilateral sagittal ramus osteotomy combined with contralateral intraoral vertical ramus osteotomy was performed on this case. Although the occlusion and the jaw movement were seemingly improved at the end of active orthogna-thic treatment, new symptoms of temporomandibular joint were observed during the retention period, which required further follow-up.

paper_title.ja: 口腔粘膜疾患と活性酸素
上顎癌治療後に二次性白血病の発症が疑われた1例
paper_title.en: Secondary leukemia developing after treatment for cancer of the maxilla

description.ja:
The development of leukemia after successful treatment of a malignancy is one of the most feared complications.
We describe a patient with secondary leukemia that developed after chemotherapy and radiotherapy for cancer of the maxilla.
A 54-year-old man presented in July 1989 with a gingival swelling in the right side of the maxilla. Squamous cell carcinoma was diagnosed on examination of a biopsy specimen. He was treated with a combination of surgery, radiotherapy, and chemotherapy. After complete remission for 3 years, pancytopenia was detected in August 1993, and acute leukemia was diagnosed on examination of a specimen obtained by bone marrow aspiration. Chromosomal analysis showed partial deletion of 5 q-. Chemotherapy failed to induce remission, and the patient died 39 days later.
description.en:

paper_title.ja: 頬部に埋入されたシリコン周囲に石灰化を来た1例(共著)
paper_title.en: A case of calcification of silicon implanted into the cheek

description.ja:
We describe a patient in whom calcification occurred around silicon implanted into the cheek to reconstruct a tissue defect caused by noma 35 years previously.
A 50-year-old woman visited our department because of a swelling of the left cheek and severely limited mouth opening. A computed tomographic scan revealed the presence of an implant, about 3cm in diameter, surrounded by calcified tissue in the left cheek. The impant was removed surgically and analyzed by scanning electron microscopy (SEM) and an X-ray microanalyzer. SEM showed that calcification occurred in the connective tissue surrouding the implant. At higher magnification, the calcification sites showed a globular structure. The major mineral components of the globular structures were calcium and phosphate. The molecular ratio of calcium and phosphate was 1.67±0.052, which was similar to that of hydroxyapatite.
description.en:
We describe a patient in whom calcification occurred around silicon implanted into the cheek to reconstruct a tissue defect caused by noma 35 years previously.
A 50-year-old woman visited our department because of a swelling of the left cheek and severely limited mouth opening. A computed tomographic scan revealed the presence of an implant, about 3cm in diameter, surrounded by calcified tissue in the left cheek. The impant was removed surgically and analyzed by scanning electron microscopy (SEM) and an X-ray microanalyzer. SEM showed that calcification occurred in the connective tissue surrouding the implant. At higher magnification, the calcification sites showed a globular structure. The major mineral components of the globular structures were calcium and phosphate. The molecular ratio of calcium and phosphate was 1.67±0.052, which was similar to that of hydroxyapatite.

paper_title.ja: 重度の気管支喘息を有する下顎前突症患者の手術管理の経験
paper_title.en: A Surgical Experience of a Patient of Mandibular Prognathism with Severe Bronchial Asthma

description.ja: 患者は, 下顎の非対称を主訴として来院した24歳の女性で, 外科手術併用による矯正治療を計画した.当初, 全身麻酔下での下顎枝矢状分割術を前提に術前矯正を開始したが, 患者は重篤な気管支喘息の既往があり, 全身麻酔時の気道刺激が重篤な喘息発作を誘発する危険性が高いと判断された.そこで治療の主目標を咬合の改善におき, 局所麻酔下に下顎骨体部分切除術を施行した.術中, 術後を通じて喘息発作は認められず, 咬合状態, 顔貌ともに著明に改善された.
description.en: A 24-years-old female patients with skeletal mandibular prognathism was scheduled for orthognathic surgery. Her chief complaint was mandibular deformity, and bilateral saggital split osteotomy under general anesthesia after preoperative orthodontic treatment was planned. However, she had a severe bronchial asthma, and her pediatricians advised that she was the contra-indication for general anesthesia. Thus she underwent body ostectomy under local anesthesia with significant improvement of her occlusion and jaw deformity. No respiratory complications occurred.
